title: Wolf Disciple Of Little Red Riding Hood
alternative_title: Akazukin no Ookami Deshi, 赤ずきんの狼弟子, Akazukin no Ookami Deshi, Akazukin no okami deshi, Red Riding Hood’s Wolf Apprentice
status: Akazukin no Ookami Deshi, 赤ずきんの狼弟子, Akazukin no Ookami Deshi, Akazukin no okami deshi, Red Riding Hood’s Wolf Apprentice
description:
Description :
        In the world exist three species: the beasts, the humans, and the hunters. Since ages beasts have been the prey of hunters, and humans the prey of beats. The story follows a famous and powerful hunter nicknamed Little Red Riding Hood, whom the life will change the day he comes across a young beast werewolf girl...
